product_name: Timbuk2 Snoop Camera Messenger Bag - X-Small - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The extra-small Timbuk2 Snoop Camera messenger bag plays it cool with classic messenger styling that conceals a padded modular interior-perfect for cameras, lenses and accessories. Modular interior walls can be repositioned to accommodate a wide array of cameras and accessories; or remove the padded insert and use the bag as a standard shoulder bag. Internal slash pocket provides a place to put files, an e-reader or a small laptop; clear, 3-zip organizer keeps filters and memory cards easy to find. The Timbuk2 Snoop Camera messenger bag in extra-small features a waterproof thermoplastic urethane lining and durable ballistic nylon exterior. Closeout.
short_description: The extra-small Timbuk2 Snoop Camera messenger bag plays it cool with classic messenger styling that conceals a padded modular interior-perfect for cameras, lenses and accessories.
